entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2023

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, May 2023

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to mention that we are beginning to report monthly on Pūjās for which Photos have been priorly uploaded but new Photos are uploaded. Very often, new uploads change the sequences, but this will not be mentioned again.
Today we have uploaded new Photos to 4 Pūjas as follows.
(i) 1975-0000 Small Pūjā: 1 low resolution uploaded, link India 1975.
(ii) 1987-1016 Śhrī Mahākālī Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Germany 1987.
(iii) 1988-0710 Śhrī Haṃsa Chakra Swāminī Pūjā: 2 high resolutions uploaded, link Germany 1988.
(iv) 1991-0325 Śhrī Rāma Pūjā: 5 high resolutions uploaded, link India 1991.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 15
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 35 Photos from the special event 1990-0409 Press Conference, Kolkata, India, the only Press Conference in West Bengal in the database, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 35 high resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to all 35 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 1990.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 11: Special Events (after 1975), Part 14
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 8 Photos from the special events during the 1976-0900 Visit, Mainland China, i.e., from the very first visit to the Mainland China, have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 6 high resolutions, 1 medium resolution, and 1 low resolutions from the Named Collections. Few of the events during this visit might have taken place at the end of August, however, it has been felt, exceptionally, more desirable, based on multiple CCT database considerations, to have only 0900 mentioned in the titles of the Photos.
[Note: 2 high resolutions were uploaded only on 2023-0518.]
The direct link to all 8 Photos in the smallest gallery: China 1976.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

Few of the events during this visit might have taken place at the end of August, however, it has been felt, exceptionally, more desirable, based on multiple CCT database considerations, to have only 0900 mentioned in the titles of the Photos. entry.title: Photos Post 14: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to mention that, after a marathon of 18 months, all the Photos have been reuploaded with the due improvements and corrections to Eternal Moments. Moreover, the addition of Moments of Joy galleries to countries has been completed.
In particular, these mean that all titles of Photos are fully searchable. Moreover, extra keywords have been added to about half of the Photos, and all these extra keywords are searchable as well.
Gradually: (i) all Photos will have additional keywords added to them; (ii) all photos of Moments of Joy will be reuploaded; (iii) all photos Moments of Joy will have additional keywords added to them.
Despite, (i) to (iii) not being completed yet, on May 5th we have started (iv) activating the download buttons of the galleries in the Chronology Folder. As a test, the Chronology 1918, 1923 and 2011 galleries have all the Photos downloadable (one at a time). We are currently (v) eliminating all the captions that have resurfaced due to reuploads and that overwrite the titles (it is a process of the type Photo by Photo verification if by chance it has a caption once reuploaded). The captions are of three categories: (a) coming from the companies that have digitized the Photos (such as 'Epson Image Scanner'), (b) contain erroneous data (like a 1996 Public Program in Budapest has the caption of a Public Program in Prague), (c) contain data that is already part of the tiles. The captions of (b) and (c) type come from either photographers or from prior sources. These eliminations of captions do not affect the metadata: one downloaded, the captions are there so that original sources can be fully traced at any time.
We are aiming to complete (iv) and (v) as an offering at Shri Ganesha Puja. The main reason for this delay is the fact that we did not get time to (vi) "remind everyone about the delicate protocols that accompany the sharing of Photos" (as per the annual report), and the top priority is to have few posts on our thoughts and suggestions.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

The main reason for this delay is the fact that we did not get time to (vi) "remind everyone about the delicate protocols that accompany the sharing of Photos" (as per the annual report), and the top priority is to have few posts on our thoughts and suggestions.
